parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the account. You can call the [DescribeAccounts](~~DescribeAccounts~~) operation to obtain the name of the account.

parameters.name: AccountPrivilege
parameters.description:
The permissions of the account. Default value: RoleReadWrite. Valid values:

*   RoleReadOnly: The account has the read-only permissions.
*   RoleReadWrite: The account has the read and write permissions.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the account belongs.
